channel.title: [BUG] Repeated use of the fill option on small segments of a deathnote causes a crash
channel.description: I was filling each individual letter on the death note I had written to create mad rainbow text, after several uses of fill the game stopped responding and I was forced to close it. Each time this has happened it has been when I was using the yellow color. Seems to be an issue specifically with using fill where the there is very little surface that is 'filled'.
